description.text:
Park Tickets Disclaimer

Unless otherwise provided by law, tickets and other entitlements are non-transferable and non-refundable without our permission. They are void if altered. The ticket is not valid for special events that require a separate admission charge. Dated tickets can be replaced twice with new dated tickets of equal or greater value by paying the difference in admission fee and eligibility to replace is based on availability; date changes must occur 2 days before the entitlement date. Guests who purchase tickets from a third-party reseller must complete exchanges or modifications from the same reseller. We may from time to time change the operating hours of the park or park attractions, close the park or any part of it temporarily, restrict the number of persons having access to the park, and/or suspend or cancel any attraction or entertainment program. Proof of identity and eligibility may be required for entry. Admission to Shanghai Disneyland is subject to park Rules and Regulations as posted on our website (https://www.shanghaidisneyresort.com/en/rules). The ticket must be used by the same person during its period of validity. At the park entrance, we will take photos of you as proof of your identity as the ticket holder. Please present your ticket for reentry to the park on the same day. We may photograph, film, videotape and/or record in the park,and your entry into the park constitutes your consent to be filmed, photographed and/or recorded, and to our use of these images and/or sound recordings, which may capture your portrait and/or voice for our internal business, administrative and operational purposes or other directly related purposes, for the purposes of meeting the legal, safety or security requirements, or for other legitimate purposes. We are not responsible for any loss or inconvenience caused by computer error which is not attributable to our fault, or unauthorized duplication or sale of the park’s tickets. View full park tickets terms and conditions at https://www.shanghaidisneyresort.com/en/tickets/terms-conditions. For the purposes of this disclaimer, "we" means either or both of “Shanghai International Theme Park Company Limited” and “Shanghai International Theme Park and Resort Management Company Limited”.

title.text: How To Use Your Disney eTicket

description.text:
ID Required for Entry

During your purchase, you provided the number of your Government ID, Passport or Travel Document ID. To enter the park, bring this document—along with your order confirmation—directly to the Main Entrance turnstile, where the tickets for this order will be printed. You will not need to first visit a ticket window. The ID or passport holder must enter the park together with all other Guests who will be using a ticket that is part of this order.

theme-park-tickets-government-id-park-re.name: Theme Park Tickets Government ID Park Restrictions
theme-park-tickets-government-id-park-re.type: Theme Park Tickets Government ID Park Restrictions

howToUseShortDescription.text: Your eTicket entitles you to admission to Shanghai Disneyland Park on the date(s) indicated above. Each day of use of a Shanghai Disneyland® Resort ticket constitutes one full day of use.

description.text:
This ticket is valid for admission to Shanghai Disneyland on the date you’ve selected.

Your government ID, passport or Travel Document ID will be checked at the front gate to confirm your theme park ticket purchase. Other restrictions apply.

Government IDs will be checked to confirm the age of Senior Guests.

Tickets are valid only on the specific date chosen. Tickets are nontransferable and nonrefundable.

†Standard: Height above 1.4M—below 65
years old
Child: Height above 1.0M to 1.4M
Senior: 65 years old and above

mobile-theme-park-tickets-general-terms-.type: SHDR Mobile Ticket General Terms of Use for 2-Day Tickets

description.text:
Park Tickets Terms and Conditions

Unless otherwise provided by law, tickets and other entitlements are non-transferable and non-refundable without our permission. They are void if altered.   The ticket must be used by the same person during its period of validity and is not valid for special events that require a separate admission charge.  Dated tickets can be replaced twice with new dated tickets of equal or greater value by paying the difference in admission fee and eligibility to replace is based on availability; date changes must occur 2 days before the entitlement date. Guests who purchase tickets from a third-party reseller must complete exchanges or modifications from the same reseller.  To ensure safety and order in the park, or if circumstances so required:

  • We reserve the right to deny admission, or to require a person already admitted to leave the park.
  • We may from time to time change the operating hours of the park or any park attraction, close the park or any part of it temporarily, restrict the number of persons having access to the park, and/or suspend or cancel any attraction or entertainment program.

Proof of identity and eligibility may be required for entry. Admission to Shanghai Disneyland is subject to park Rules and Regulations as posted on our website (https://www.shanghaidisneyresort.com/rules). At the park entrance, we will take photos of you as proof of your identity as the ticket holder. Please present your ticket for reentry to the park on the same day.  We may photograph, film, videotape and/or record in the park, and your entry into the park constitutes your consent to be filmed, photographed and/or recorded, and to our use of these images and/or sound recordings, which may capture your portrait and/or voice for our internal business, administrative and operational purposes or other directly related purposes, for the purposes of meeting the legal, safety or security requirements, or for other legitimate purposes. We are not responsible for any loss or inconvenience caused by computer error which is not attributable to our fault, or unauthorized duplication or sale of the park’s tickets.  Each park ticket printed confirmation allows one entry at a Shanghai Disneyland turnstile. Upon entry, the Guest will be provided with a standard park ticket for use for the applicable purchased days. In the event that duplicate park tickets are presented for park admission, we reserve the right to refuse entry.  All prices are in Chinese Yuan. Ticket orders are not confirmed until a confirmation number is received. Children less than 100 cm in height receive free park admission.    Guests must be 18 years of age or older to purchase tickets on the website. These terms and conditions are subject to change. If there are mandatory requirements stated in the laws otherwise, then related ordinances will be followed. For the purposes of these terms and conditions, "we" means either or both of “Shanghai International Theme Park Company Limited” and “Shanghai International Theme Park and Resort Management Company Limited”.

theme-park-tickets-general-terms-and-con.name: Theme Park Tickets Terms and Conditions
theme-park-tickets-general-terms-and-con.type: Theme Park Tickets Terms and Conditions

howToUseSteps.text:
1. Have your printed eTicket ready to present, or bookmark this page on your mobile device.
  2. Proceed directly to the Main Entrance turnstile and present your eTicket or have it scanned from your mobile device that has Internet access. You will not need to wait in the Ticket Purchase queue.
  3. You will be granted admission to the park after your valid ticket has been scanned and voided, and you will be provided with a paper ticket for same-day re-admission (for the length of your ticket).

mobile-theme-park-tickets-orderconfirmat.name: SHDR Mobile Order Confirmation Fine Print
mobile-theme-park-tickets-orderconfirmat.type: SHDR Mobile Order Confirmation Fine Print

description.text:
If your eTicket has a barcode, proceed directly to a park entrance and have it scanned from your mobile device. After presenting an eTicket, you will be issued a physical ticket, and your eTicket will no longer be usable. The physical ticket will be required for park re-entry.
IDs will be checked to confirm the age of seniors.

mobile-theme-park-tickets-eticket-how-to.name: SHDR Mobile TPT How to use steps - No Gov ID
mobile-theme-park-tickets-eticket-how-to.type: SHDR Mobile TPT How to use steps - No Gov ID

description.text:
Dated Tickets

Your tickets are valid only on the date(s) indicated above.

howToUseSteps.text: 1. Your Disney Premier Access selection will automatically be added to your plans. Head to the Fastpass Return entrance and present your code.

howToUseShortDescription.text: If you added your eTickets to your Government ID, you can follow the steps below instead.

description.text: During your purchase, you provided the number of your Government ID, Passport or Travel Document ID. To enter the park, bring this document directly to the Main Entrance turnstile, along with your order confirmation. You will not need to first visit a ticket window. The ID or passport holder must have a ticket and enter the park together with all Guests who will be using a ticket that is part of this order.
